channel.title: Client error, need help!
channel.description:
Well, I've been working on this server, and client for months. Then I stopped working on it. Now it's 2 months later, and I change my server IP, since I used to run it on a VPS. My server runs fine, but not my client. Gives me this error on the CMD "Debian java.lang.NullPointerException at client.preloadModels(client.java:973) at client.startUp(client.java:8772) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5953) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Connecting to update server 60
And on the Client, it says "Sorry an error has occured whilst loading runescape. To fix this, try the following:(in order)
1. Try closing all web browser windows, and reloading. (I did this)
2.Try clearing your web browser cache from tools-> internet options (I did this too)
3. Try using a different game world. (???)
4. Try rebooting your computer (Did this also)
5. Try selecting a different version of java from the playgame menu (???)

item.title: Client error, need help!
item.dc:creator: @123blademan1 123blademan1
item.description:
@123blademan1 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Did I say in the cache folder? No.

I said ‘Raw’

That’s where it’s trying to load from.[/quote]

I didn’t add it in the cache folder. I got it working, disabled preloading like you said. Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Client error, need help!
item.dc:creator: @123blademan1 123blademan1
item.description:
@123blademan1 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]In your client folder, is there a folder called ‘Raw’?
If not, create it. If there is, check to see if there’s anything in it.
If it’s empty, you need to disable preloading, or add models.[/quote]

I have models in my cache folder… How do I disable preloading?

Read full topic

item.title: Client error, need help!
item.dc:creator: @123blademan1 123blademan1
item.description:
@123blademan1 wrote:

I Vain I:

Then post your Client class (.java) on PasteBin.com

Here you go. http://pastebin.com/SB9mVUyj Btw, I removed my IP from it, I replaced it with 12.34.567.89. Just a heads up. Thanks if you can help!

Read full topic

item.title: Client error, need help!
item.dc:creator: @123blademan1 123blademan1
item.description:
@123blademan1 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]As it’s crashing due to preloading; I believe it may be due to the modelIndex or the preload directory is empty.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


I suggest reading through this.[/quote]

I’m on a 317, it’s never done this before.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mr_Firecape wrote:

  1. did you have a cache?

Read full topic
